Description: Move left curly braces to be at the end of the prior line instead of on their own line
Notes: Prior to running this you should run Format-ScriptRemoveSuperfluousSpaces.

Description: Convert any keywords and operators to lower-case
Expand aliases to full verb-noun command names
Notes: Use Format-ScriptFormatCommandNames with the ExpandAliases switch

Description: Expand shortened type accelerators to full name format
Notes: Default mode skips all system type accelerators.

Description: Places a space after every comma in an array assignment
Indent all code appropriately.
Properly formats command elements to be PascalCased.
Splits hash assignments out to their own lines
Places a space before and after every operator
Converts typenames to be case-formated
Pad binary expressions with single spaces
Pad assignment operators with single spaces
if backticks are used to split lines this can be used to fine any of these and remove any spaces at the end
Removes superfluous semicolons at the end of individual lines of code and splits them into their own lines of code.
Removes superfluous spaces at the end of any lines of code. Herestrings are ignored.
Notes: Generally this should be called first.

Description: Finds herestrings and replaces them with equivalent code to eliminate the herestring, this is best followed by
Find and replace goofy characters you may have copied from the web
Fix CRLF inconsistencies
Replace piped output to out-null with $null = equivalent
Any lines past 130 characters (or however many characters you like) are broken into newlines at the pipeline characters if possible
